snippet: Jared Lee Loughner, the man accused of killing six people and wounding Representative Gabrielle Giffords in 2011, is expected to plead guilty on Tuesday.
abstract: Jared Lee Loughner, the man accused of killing six people and wounding Arizona Rep Gabrielle Giffords of Arizona in 2011, is expected to plead guilty.
lead_paragraph: Jared Lee Loughner, the man accused of killing six people and wounding Representative Gabrielle Giffords in 2011, is expected to plead guilty on Tuesday.

headline.seo: Guilty Plea Expected in Tucson Rampage That Wounded Giffords
headline.main: Guilty Plea Is Expected in Rampage That Wounded Giffords
headline.print_headline: Guilty Plea Is Expected in Rampage That Wounded Giffords
